<<<<<<< HEAD
The essence and unitie of the Church Catholike visible, and the prioritie thereof in regard of particular churches discussed. / By Samuel Hudson minister of the Gospell. Hudson, Samuel, 17th cent.
[4], 52 p.
Printed by George Miller for Christopher Meredith at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Churchyard., London, : 1645.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 8th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
